input.sentences: i had to clean my work area today .
i took all the pictures and papers on my desk and taped them to the wall .
and now my wall is decorated .
output.sentences: She worked from home and her computer was her most important piece of office equipment.
She taped photos on the wall to remind herself that she was not alone.
Some days she almost felt like she was in an office building cubicle.
She felt that way until one of her children needed her to wipe his bottom.
